description: This Azure quickstart template deploys a Ansible Tower Solution on Azure Virtual Machines running RHEL 7.2. Template will build everything starting from Azure Infrastructure components to Ansible Tower and Clients installation, configuration etc and will deploy one Ansible tower server vm and 2 clients.Ansible Tower by Red Hat helps you scale IT automation, manage complex deployments and speed productivity. Centralize and control your IT infrastructure with a visual dashboard, role-based access control, job scheduling and graphical inventory management
summary: This template deploys an Ansible Tower Solution running on RHEL on Azure
